title: BRFX Spin2Win
instructions:
Press **Spin** for a normal play (5×5 board). Rows/Cols with **3+ matching symbols** pay **base value × match count**; 🃏 wilds substitute. Any ✖️ multipliers anywhere on the board **stack and multiply your total**.

**Normal Spins:** 1 spin every **5 minutes** per user (no daily cap).

**💥 MEGA Spins:** **3 per day**, reset at **midnight ET (America/New_York)**. Requires **> 1,000 points** and costs **10% of your current points** up front. MEGA spins grant **boosted payouts** (on top of in-grid multipliers). The result shown is your **net change** (gross win − cost).

The message shows a **Top 10 leaderboard** (total points, total spins, avg/spin) and **recent big wins**. Good luck!
